title: Two campaign websites and logos
content:
Hi,  
You may remember that you guys helped me design the "Dorsol Plants for Seattle City Council" logo a few weeks ago.

I just posted the website yesterday. It shows the final version the candidate and his campaign manager approved. I think the white and shades of green look good set into the earthy color scheme.  
 [**Dorsol Plants website**](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821073413/http:/dorsolplants.com/)

Here is the website of one of young Mr. Plants' opponents:  
 [**other candidate**](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821073413/http:/www.bloomforcouncil.com/meet_david_bloom.html)

Mr Bloom has a long resume, but the graphic design kind of sucks, don't you think? He doesn't even have a proper logo, just the title set in Gill Sans. The welcome page isn't pleasant to look at...but maybe that's just me.

Thoughts?

Dina
author: dinazina
